meanings.definition: The quality or state of being indubitable.
meanings.sent1: The indubitablenesses of her argument left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on the indubitablenesses of empirical evidence.
meanings.sent3: The indubitablenesses of his claim made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence had an indubitablenesses that was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The indubitablenesses of the sunrise painted the sky with certainty.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of being unquestionable or certain.
meanings.sent1: The indubitablenesses of his alibi convinced the jury.
meanings.sent2: In mathematics, proofs aim to establish indubitablenesses.
meanings.sent3: The indubitablenesses of the weather forecast made him smile.
meanings.sent4: His honesty had an indubitablenesses that shone through.
meanings.sent5: The indubitablenesses of her love for him was evident in every gesture.
